title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not change the focus.
EB: The expected behavior is that clicking on the first Combo should move the focus caret to the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR: To reproduce, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Then, press the 'Tab' key, and the focus should transition to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
